verbose_text: The findings showed that tetra-O-galloyl-beta-D-glucose and luteolin inhibited SARS-CoV infection in a dose dependent manner, having EC 50 values of 4.5 and 10.6 muM, respectively, where EC 50 value of glycyrrhizin was> 607.6 muM in the mentioned study.
